# entity 
adder
# architecture
struct
# generic parameters
g_BUS_WIDTH
# generic param values
8
# input pins
i_a(8), i_b(8)
# output pins
o_s(8)
# test cases
00000000,00000000,00000000
00000000,00000001,00000001
11111111,00000000,11111111
10101010,11001100,01110110
00011100,10101011,11000111
00011111,00001001,00101000
